sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-register', templateUrl: './register.component.html', styleUrls: ['./register.component.scss'] }) export class RegisterComponent { public myForm: FormGroup = this.fb.group({ user: ['', [Validators.required], Validators.minLength(3)], email: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.email]], password: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.minLength(6)]], password2: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.minLength(6)]], }); constructor(private fb: FormBuilder) { } isValidField(field: string) { } onSubmit() { this.myForm.markAllAsTouched(); } }
